item.description:
Come join us for the first Spring group ride. We will be heading to Sullivan's at Castle Island (Fort Independence Park‎) in South Boston for lunch then scooting around where ever the roads take us.

We will be departing from our new group ride launch pad. I have chosen this location to be more centrally located for riders from all around the greater Boston area and due to most rides following routes outside of 95. The parking lot is large and a safe place to let others try your ride. (Some other rides will still start in Brighton as well)

Starting point map: MAP

Hope to see you there!

Paul

P.S. Due to the ongoing payments to Meetup.com to keep this group in existence I need to start charging a Meetup fee to pay the bills. If lots of people show up, I'll lower the fee.
item.how_to_find_us: Just look for scooters in the parking lot
item.why: Scooting in groups is so much better than riding alone and safer too!
item.name: Group ride to Sullivan's at Castle Island for lunch
